SourceString:
<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Damage with Weapon Attacks
<b>{ASCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Attack Speed

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Damage with Weapon Attacks
<b>{ASNext}|floor()%</> increased Attack Speed
<b>30%</> increased <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> Chance with Weapon Attacks

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>+{FlatHPCurrent}|floor()</> Health
<b>{IncrHPCurrent}%</> increased Health
<b>{IncrArmorCurrent}%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>+{FlatHPNext}|floor()</> Health
<b>{IncrHPNext}%</> increased Health
<b>{IncrArmorNext}%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
For each enemy within a <b>{Radius}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius, gain <b>{Dmg}|round()%</> increased Damage up to <b>{LimitCurrent}|round()%</>.

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
For each enemy within a <b>{Radius}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius, gain <b>{Dmg}|round()%</> increased Damage up to <b>{LimitNext}|round()%</>.
Gain another <b>{Dmg}|round()%</> increased Damage per enemy. The Damage Increase limit stays the same.
<b>{Limit}|round()%</> added to the Damage Increase limit.
Gain <b>{Armor}|round()%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</> per enemy up to <b>{Limit_UI}|round()%</> (half the limit for Damage).

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Damage
<b>{RageEffectCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rage>Rage</> Effect

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Damage
<b>{RageEffectNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rage>Rage</> Effect
On kill you have a <b>{Chance}%</> Chance to gain <b>{RageAmount}</> <me_Rage>Rage</>

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Physical>Physical Damage</>
<b>{AilmentCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> and <me_Stagger>Stagger</> Chance

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Physical>Physical Damage</>
<b>{AilmentNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> and <me_Stagger>Stagger</> Chance

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
Whenever you hit an enemy with a Melee skill, gain <b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Damage and <b>20%</> increased Movement Speed for <b>1s</>.

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Whenever you hit an enemy with a Melee skill, gain <b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Damage and <b>20%</> increased Movement Speed for <b>1s</>.
While affected by Combat Rush gain <b>15%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>
While affected by Combat Rush gain <b>12%</> increased Weapon Damage
While affected by Combat Rush gain <b>15%</> increased Health Regeneration

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{ArmorCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>
<b>+{MagicResCurrent}%</> to <me_Thermic>Thermic</> and <me_Nature>Natural</> Resistances
<b>{DodgeCDSpdCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Dodge Cooldown Rate

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{ArmorNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Armor>Armor</>
<b>+{MagicResNext}%</> to <me_Thermic>Thermic</> and <me_Nature>Natural</> Resistances
<b>{DodgeCDSpdNext}|floor()%</> increased Dodge Cooldown Rate
<b>{Barrier}%</> increased <me_FreeBarrier>Free Barrier</> with a shield equipped

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Projectile Damage
<b>{ProjSpeedCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Projectile Speed

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Projectile Damage
<b>{ProjSpeedNext}|floor()%</> increased Projectile Speed
<b>25%</> increased Projectile Damage\n<b>40%</> reduced Projectile Speed
<b>25%</> increased Projectile Speed and Projectile Range

<b>{RageDurationCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rage>Rage</> Duration

<b>{RageEffectNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rage>Rage</> Effect
<b>{RageDurationNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rage>Rage</> Duration

Whenever <me_Rage>Rage</> <me_Overflow>Overflows</>, gain <b>+{WeaponDmg}</> Weapon <me_PierceDam>Pierce</> and <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> and <b>{MSmod}%</> increased Movement Speed for <b>{Duration}s</>.

Regenerate <b>{HealthRegenCurrent}%</> Health per second
<b>{IncrRegenCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Health Regeneration
<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Regenerate <b>{HealthRegenNext}%</> Health per second
<b>{IncrRegenNext}|floor()%</> increased Health Regeneration
While below <b>{Threshold}%</> Health, regenerate <b>{Regen}%</> Health per second

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
Unlocks <b>Bleed - Rupture</>
<b>{BleedChanceCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Chance
<b>{BleedDamageCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Damage
<b>{RuptureDamageCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rupture>Rupture</> Damage

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Unlocks <b>Bleed - Rupture</>
<b>{BleedChanceNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Chance
<b>{BleedDamageNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Bleed>Bleed</> Damage
<b>{RuptureDamageNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Rupture>Rupture</> Damage

<b>Bleed - Rupture</>
When you apply <me_Bleed>Bleed</>, you have a +<b>1%</> chance per <me_Bleed>Bleed</> stack on target to cause <me_Rupture>Rupture</>.

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
Unlocks <me_SpellRage>Spell Rage</>
<b>{SpellDamageCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Spell Damage
<b>{AttackDamageCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Attack Damage

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Unlocks <me_SpellRage>Spell Rage</>
<b>{SpellDamageNext}|floor()%</> increased Spell Damage
<b>{AttackDamageNext}|floor()%</> increased Attack Damage

<me_SpellRage>Spell Rage</>
<me_Rage>Rage</> also grants:
<b>1%</> increased Total Spell Damage per stack
<b>1%</> increased Cast Speed per stack
